name: Legacy of Flan 3: Storm of Hades
storyline: The Land o' Flan is once again in peril. A mysterious monster flan has risen up out of the earth and spawned six demons to wreck havoc on the peaceful flans that live there. You control one flan on his quest to vanquish the six demons and gather their spirit stars, which symbolize their defeat. Only once you have claimed all six stars may you challenge the mysterious foe that started it all.
summary: Legacy of Flan 3 : Storm of Hades is the third installment in the Legacy Of Flan series, created by Scott Cawthon. The game was an MMORPG, which means the game was online. It was created using the Moo2 extension in the software Multimedia Fusion. Unfortunately, the servers for this game were shut down a long time ago, making the game unplayable. However, somebody discovered a way of fixing the game.
